thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Calm Amid the Storm
Stocks rebounded a day after the Dow industrials suffered their biggest one-day point drop on record. The blue-chip index changed direction 29 times over the course of Tuesday’s session before surging in the final hour to close up 2.3%. Tracking the recovery, Asian and European markets Wednesday regained their footing. However, spooked investors worry that the sudden return of volatility could put the nearly nine-year bull market at risk. Monday’s rout, followed by an abrupt surge in an index...
